results.content: Useful information about data analytics and has been presented well by the instructor.

results.content:
This course offers an acceptable overview of many data science tools on real data. If you're looking for a beginner's primer on the material, this course may be for you. If you're used to Indian English, then the teacher's voice shouldn't be an issue. What could be improved is focusing on and diving deeper into data. There were some lectures that focused on importing, for example, data from the Boston real estate area, manipulating it a bit and the lecture ended. Then, in the lecture immediately after, the data the teacher was using as an example was chemical compositions of glass; the video after that bounced to another set of data; eventually, we returned to the Boston data, then shot off to recurring sets of data. The teacher is quite knowledgeable in the material and the processes; I felt that she could have taken a set of data and used it longer from start to finish. 

As I said, this is a good start. Take notes of key terms and concepts and use this video as a platform into other courses on those key terms and concepts. 

Nevertheless, a big thanks to the instructor for taking the time to put together this course.

There were some lectures that focused on importing, for example, data from the Boston real estate area, manipulating it a bit and the lecture ended. Then, in the lecture immediately after, the data the teacher was using as an example was chemical compositions of glass; the video after that bounced to another set of data; eventually, we returned to the Boston data, then shot off to recurring sets of data. The teacher is quite knowledgeable in the material and the processes; I felt that she could have taken a set of data and used it longer from start to finish.

As I said, this is a good start. Take notes of key terms and concepts and use this video as a platform into other courses on those key terms and concepts.

Nevertheless, a big thanks to the instructor for taking the time to put together this course.

results.content:
Would give -1

The worst part is Statistics. Doesn't seem that author has full understanding on what is she talking about. 

There is emphasis on how this course is so much better than all the others since it concentrates on real data. Then when she apply some basic stats on that real data - it doesn't make any sense. I.e. tables full of mean with same values (can't attach the screenshot unfortunately). Author skips explanation of what is the meaning of parameters. I.e. just saying and thats alpha, but what is a meaning of alpha?!!!

Also those facebook pop up notification on videos are just unprofessional
